content.rendered:
About Unicorn Fx Global Capital Market Services Ltd

Unicorn Fx Global Capital Market Services is a global forex broker founded by an expert team to offer world-class trading conditions to amateur and professional traders. Utilizing cutting-edge technology and infrastructure, we provide favorable trading conditions to help you grow.

We provide you with an exclusive and lucrative opportunity to trade in a large number of global financial instruments using a single account. On top of it, you get access to a world-class trading platform, dedicated customer support desk and convenient deposit/withdrawal options to simplify your trading journey.

  • Our History
  • Our Mission
  • Our Vision

Unicorn Fx Global Capital Market Services was started by veteran brokers and trading professionals to popularize online trading among amateur traders. At the same time, we founded the company to offer institutional-grade liquidity to amateur and professional traders alike.

We endeavor to make the trading journey of traders convenient, delightful and fruitful by providing access to all the tools, techniques and technologies required to trade swiftly, diversify their portfolio and improve their trading strategy.

To become a leading player in the global trading ecosystem by promoting online trading activities among common masses and giving them the benefit of accessing world’s largest financial market and exclusive trading opportunities.

Inspiration, innovation, and opportunities.

Take advantage of the experiential-learning opportunities built into many programs. You can work in labs on and off

Open Live Account

Why Choose Us?

Superior Trading Conditions

Enjoy institutional grade liquidity, competitive spreads and high leverage with a trading account.

Dedicated Support Desk

Get all answers and solutions promptly by contacting a dedicated support desk, available 24×5

Multiple Trading Options

Trade in forex, metals, CFDs and indices from a single trading account with Unicorn Fx Global Markets Ltd

Our Licenses and Regulations

Regulated by FSC, Mauritius

The Financial Services Commission, Mauritius (the 'FSC') is the integrated regulator for the non-bank financial services sector and global business. Established in 2001, the FSC is mandated under the Financial Services Act, the Captive Insurance Act, the Insurance Act, the Private Pension Schemes Act, the Securities Act, and the Virtual Asset and Initial Token Offering Services Act to license, regulate, monitor and supervise the conduct of business activities in these sectors.

License no. - GB23201820
